name: Mini-adventures 5-pack
description: Since 2010 I've made five shorter comics, two telling self-contained stories, and a series of three Giant Days books which tell an ongoing story in self-contained chapters. I'm proud of these stories, I think they're some of my best work. This pack collects them all at a significant saving! THAT 40pp, colour, A4 format MURDER SHE WRITES 40pp, colour, A5 format GIANT DAYS 1 32pp, colour, A5 GIANT DAYS 2 36pp, colour, A5 GIANT DAYS 3 36pp, colour, A5 Personalised options are also available - just look in the dropdown menu. If you order a personalised book, send a quick email using the contact form on the right with the character (one only per book, please)/message you'd like if you have a preference. Customers outside the UK: if you don't want these books personalised, they are/will be available from Topatoco soon.

name: Giant Days Series
description: GIANT DAYS 1 32pp, colour A collection of the first Giant Days story. Esther de Groot begins university, and manages to find new friends and appalling enemies within half an hour. GIANT DAYS 2 36pp, colour Esther's reputation takes a knock, Susan Ptolemy can't get a good night's sleep, and Daisy just wants to fit in. She is never going to fit in. GIANT DAYS 3 36pp, colour Susan and Daisy are drawn to the hand-wringing outpost of Indie Society, while Esther ends up somewhere a lot more dangerous. GIANT DAYS THREE PACK Giant Days 1, 2 & 3 - and SAVE! Personalised options are also available - just look in the dropdown menu. If you order a personalised book, send a quick email using the contact form on the right with the character (one only per book, please)/message you'd like if you have a preference. Customers outside the UK: if you don't want these books personalised, they will be available from Topatoco soon.

name: THAT/Murder She Writes 2-pack
description: Two Shelley Winters stories no longer on the website! Self contained yarns ideal to introduce a friend to my stories. MURDER SHE WRITES 40pp, colour "A pleasant writers’ retreat becomes a snowbound fear factory as a prominent author is murdered, and it falls to tween sleuth Charlotte Grote to unpick the web of lies, deceit, smoking and romance." THAT 36pp, colour A4 size - double the size of my other books Successful children’s author Shelley Winters is on a book tour of the United States when she passes through the idyllic town of Heaven, Arizona. The Heaven Lemon Festival is in full swing, the locals are delightful, and the stage is set for a very nice time indeed. So why, exactly, do people keep disappearing in the night? And what is that strange FLIT FLIT sound on the wind?" Personalised options are also available - just look in the dropdown menu. If you order a personalised book, send a quick email using the contact form on the right with the character (one only per book, please)/message you'd like if you have a preference. Customers outside the UK/Ireland: if you don't want these books personalised, they are available from Topatoco

options.name: THAT & Murder She Writes 1 x personalisation

name: Shelley Winters: THAT book
description: IN STOCK 36pp, colour A4 size - double the size of my other books Successful children’s author Shelley Winters is on a book tour of the United States when she passes through the idyllic town of Heaven, Arizona. The Heaven Lemon Festival is in full swing, the locals are delightful, and the stage is set for a very nice time indeed. So why, exactly, do people keep disappearing in the night? And what is that strange FLIT FLIT sound on the wind?" This LARGE FORMAT (11.7 x 8.3 in) book collects my THAT story starring Shelley Winters, from July 2012, with 4 new pages and many subtle amendments and enhancements. This book is also available in a variety of money-saving combo packs. Add personalisation to the book in the dropdown below. If you order a personalised book, send a quick email using the contact form on the right with the character/message you'd like if you have a preference. Customers outside the United Kingdom may prefer to buy this book from Topatoco and take advantage of cheaper shipping from a North American location.

name: Murder She Writes Book
description: IN STOCK 40pp, colour "A pleasant writers’ retreat becomes a snowbound fear factory as a prominent author is murdered, and it falls to tween sleuth Charlotte Grote to unpick the web of lies, deceit, smoking and romance." This book collects my Murder She Writes story starring Charlotte Grote and Shelley Winters, from Nov-Dec 2011, with 4 new pages. Murder, intrigue, etc. This book is also available in a variety of money-saving combo packs. Add personalisation to the book in the dropdown below. Customers outside the UK who do not want the book personalised should purchase this book from Topatoco.

name: Giant Days book
description: 32pp, colour (it's sort of monochrome but it is in colour!) This is a little collection I made of the Giant Days mini-series I did in 2010, starring Esther de Groot. If you want Giant Days and my other short comic, Ghosts, it only costs £1 more for the SUPERDEAL! If you choose 'PERSONALISED' from the dropdown list, the price includes a sketch of a character from Bad Machinery or Scary Go Round (and/or a message of your choice) to your book purchase. If you're not sure which character you want, I will make the editorial decision for you. Please add details of what you would like at checkout (here's where you can add a note - if there's insufficient space use the contact form on your right to drop me a line!).

name: Custom postcards - easy & hard
description: EASY POSTCARD: £6 gets you a sketch of a Scary Go Round/Bad Machinery character of your choice on an A6 (5.8 x 4.1 inch) postcard. It might be pencil, or fountain pen, or another medium - but I won't send you a stinker. HARD POSTCARD: For £11 you can get a drawing of anyone not in the comic - a friend, a family member, Caprica 6 off Battlestar Galactica, Isembard Kingdom Brunel etc etc on a 3.5x5.5 inch postcard. Please note that there is a limit of one person per card. Please add details of what you would like at checkout (here's where you can add a note - if you need to send a photo of the subject, send it to scarygoround@gmail.com with "SGR POSTCARD" as the subject line. Shipped in a hard-backed envelope.

name: Books Not Boys print
description: Books Not Boys totes and t-shirts are available from Topatoco! Boys are good for nothin'. NOTHIN'. High quality giclee prints on archival matte paper. Available in: A5 size (5.8 x 8.3 inches) A4 size (8.27 x 11.69 inches) A3 size (11.69 x 16.54 inches) Shipped flat. Signed. A3 prints are shipped with heavy cardboard reinforcement to ensure damage-free delivery.

name: Individual strip print
description:
Choose any comic from the archive (excluding guest strips) and receive an A4 size (8.27 by 11.69 inches) colour print on archival matte paper. The strip will be signed and dated with the date of the original strip, and shipped in a sturdy card mailer. Once you place your order, please email me to tell me which strip you want. Specify the date in the archive and the first line of dialogue as a safety check! I don't want to send you the wrong one! Please note:
  • All strips are printed from the original hi-resolution artwork
  • Square strips will be trimmed to 8.27x8.27 inches

name: Heavy Metal Hearts And Flowers ebook
description: PDF Format, 99 pages, colour Originally published in 2005 and long out of print, Heavy Metal Hearts & Flowers details Tim Jones' struggle against winsome poppets, second-rate businessmen and cuboid killing machines. The story was created specially for this book and did not appear on the website. This was one of my favourite Scary Go Round stories, it's much more carefully plotted than other SGR stories of that era and features Amy, Shelley, Len, plus many more characters - including a few from "Bobbins" who never made it to Scary Go Round. I was, and remain, very proud of it. You will receive a download notification via email shortly after ordering.

name: Ghosts eBook
description: PDF Format, 40pp, B&W Ghosts was a Scary Go Round book I put out in late 2003, wherein Shelley, Amy and Ryan deal with a phantom. You will receive a download notification via email shortly after ordering.

name: Looks Brains & Everything (SGR Book 1) ebook
description: PDF Format, 163 pages, colour This is an ebook version of the first (now out-of-print) Scary Go Round collection. This version features, for the first time, the original Tessa and Rachel story "Gas" with a new introduction explaining the origins of Scary Go Round. It also features all the extras from previous print editions - bonus pages, several out-take comics, character bios, new drawings and a couple of short essays from 2006. You will receive a download notification via email shortly after ordering. Ebooks can be purchased together and at the same time as physical items.

name: Blame The Sky (SGR Book 2) ebook
description: PDF Format, 265 pages, colour This is an ebook version of the second (long out-of-print) Scary Go Round collection. This version has a new 2011 introduction, and also features all the extras from previous print editions - bonus pages, many redrawn pages, chapter introductions and all the Scary Go Round comics from March 4th 2003 to March 27th, 2004. It features the following stories: "Down", "Romania", "Dimensionality", "Where The Dumb Things Are", "Ballad Of The Man", "Shopgirl", "Robot Town Hall" and "Bad Religion". You will receive a download notification via email shortly after ordering. Ebooks can be purchased together and at the same time as physical items.

name: Skellington (SGR Book 3) ebook
description: PDF Format, 202 pages, colour This is an ebook version of the third (long out-of-print) Scary Go Round collection. This version has a new 2012 introduction, and also features all the extras from previous print editions - bonus pages, many redrawn pages, new pages, chapter introductions and all the Scary Go Round comics from May 9th 2004 to March 11th, 2005. It features the following stories: "Count My Toes", "Rock Chronicles", "1840 And All That", "Man-O-War", "Pa", "Crock Of Gold" and "The Child". You will receive a download notification via email shortly after ordering. Ebooks can be purchased together and at the same time as physical items.

name: Retribution Index (SGR Book 4) ebook
description: PDF Format, 244 pages, colour This is an ebook version of the fourth (now out-of-print) Scary Go Round collection. This version features a new introduction, plus the extras from previous print editions - bonus pages, redrawn pages, chapter introductions by Shelley, and all the Scary Go Round comics from March 14th 2005 to February 17th 2006. It restores the 'Oldbourne' story which was left out of the original version, with a new introduction. It features the following stories: "Bulgaria", "The Election", "Abductions", "Schoolin'", "The Witch", "Battle Of The Bands" and "Oldbourne". You will receive a download notification via email shortly after ordering. Ebooks can be purchased together and at the same time as physical items.

name: Custom A4 character drawing
description:
It usually takes me 7-10 days to do these drawings. If you want an A4 (29.7 x 21cm) picture of a single character from Scary Go Round, Bad Machinery (or even, god forbid, "Bobbins") there is a flat price for that on a plain white background (see left). It's £25 in black and white or £40 for colour.
  • Sometimes I will draw these with pen and ink, sometimes I do them on the computer and print them out on archival paper. This is to make sure I do you the absolute best drawing. If I did it on the computer, rest assured that nobody else is getting the same drawing.
  • Sometimes I colour on the computer, sometimes in Copic markers, again, I will be going for the best possible result.
  • The picture to the left indicates how big an item I will draw a character with upon request. No bigger than a chicken.
  • I reserve the right to refuse and refund unreasonable requests.
Please add details of what you would like at checkout (here's where you can add a note - if you miss your chance, send an email to scarygoround@gmail.com with "SGR DRAWING" as the subject line.) Shipped in a hard-backed envelope.

name: Girl Spy ebook
description: PDF Format, 24 pages, colour Girl Spy was a Scary Go Round book I put out in late 2003, wherein Fallon Young takes on the terrifying "Crime Pope". This book has been out of print for about 5 years! You will receive a download notification via email shortly after ordering.

name: Recklessly Yours - SGR Book 8, PERSONALISED
description: 216 pages, full colour, paperback. Shipping £3.00 UK/Eire/US/Canada/ £4.50 Anywhere else Collecting the final Scary Go Round comics from September 8th 2008 to September 11th 2009, plus detailed chapter introductions, new illustrations and a sketchbook section with details of an apocalyptically awful alterative final story. Contains: "Carrot vs Stick", "Extra Income", "The Estate", "Looking For Atlantis" and "Goodbye". Price includes a sketch of a character from Bad Machinery or Scary Go Round (and/or a message of your choice) to your book purchase. If you're not sure which character you want, I will make the editorial decision for you. Please add details of what you would like at checkout (here's where you can add a note - if there's insufficient space use the contact form on your right to drop me a line!).

Please add details of what you would like at checkout (here's where you can add a note - if there's insufficient space use the contact form on your right to drop me a line!).

name: Adventure Time: Marceline & The Scream Queens (WEB EXCLUSIVE COVER)
description:
I have a very few copies (in most cases, one or two) left of the web-exclusive Adventure Time: Marceline & The Scream Queens issues I did covers for. They are the same price that they were when bought direct from Boom! Studios.

Needless to say, this is the Eisner-nominated comic written and drawn by Meredith Gran and it is lumping brilliant.

Books are shipped bagged and boarded and can be signed upon request - contact me using the CONTACT link on the right if you want them signed.

name: Ghosts
